element.label: Hostname
element.description: A string containing a hostname or IP address of the database server. If the database is running on the same host as the PHP application, you may use 'localhost' or '127.0.0.1'.

element.label: Username
element.description: Account identifier for authenticating a connection to the RDBMS server.

element.label: Password
element.description: Account password credential for authenticating a connection to the RDBMS server.

element.label: Database Name
element.description: Database instance name on the RDBMS server.

element.label: Database Port
element.description: Some RDBMS servers can accept network connections on a administrator-specified port number. The port parameter allow you to specify the port to which your PHP application connects, to match the port configured on the RDBMS server.

element.label: Default Charset
element.description: Specify the charset used for the connection.
